author: bayard
msg: Switching the catch(Exception -> throw ClassCast to code that catches the particular exceptions thrown and rethrows them as RuntimeExceptions. The previous catch caught too much as complained about in #BEANUTILS-241

author: rahul
msg: Proper cleanup, the logical equivalent of reaching an "end" state in the legacy API.

author: hossman
msg: small tweak: facet.limit now assumes a sensible default of 100 to prevent extreme amounts of data from being returned to a naive client.  negative values for facet.limit force the limitless behavior
